mitigation_text: Run early GIS + constraints screening with documented evidence pack.
applicable_drivers: Poor early GIS; boundary disputes; sensitive receptors

mitigation_text: Commission land-status/forest-map opinion early; resolve overlaps before submissions.
applicable_drivers: Forest map inconsistencies; land title issues

mitigation_text: Pre-consult key consultees to validate dossier scope and likely conditions.
Lender-grade QA for EIA/permit packs (checklists, consistency, version control).
Stakeholder mapping + engagement plan for high-sensitivity projects.
Grid pre-feasibility + POI alternatives; keep fallback options.
Maintain a grid interface pack + weekly operator cadence.
Detailed commissioning/test plan early with operator checkpoints.
Strict document control + evidence capture rules (IDs, links, snapshots).
